Translations.Text: And We have committed to Hell many Jinn and humans; they had hearts with which they did not comprehend, and they had eyes with which they did not see, and they had ears with which they did not hear. They are like cattle; no, they are even more astray. These are the unaware ones
And to God belong the beautiful names, so call Him by them; and ignore those who blaspheme in His names. They will be punished for what they used to do
And from among those We created is a community who guides with truth, and with it they are just
As for those who deny Our revelations, We will entice them from where they do not know
And I will encourage them, for My scheming is formidable
Do they not reflect Their companion has no madness; but he is a clear warner
Did they not look at the dominion of heavens and Earth, and all that God has created Perhaps their time is drawing near; so in which narrations after this one will they believe
Whoever God misguides, then there is none to guide him; and He leaves them blindly wandering in their transgression

They ask you regarding the Hour: "When will be its time" Say: "Its knowledge is with my Lord, none can reveal its coming except Him. It is heavy through the heavens and the Earth; it will not come to you except suddenly." They ask you, as if you are responsible for it! Say: "Its knowledge is with God, but most people do not know
